title: Video of health workers being attacked in Indore falsely shared as ‘Situation in Hyderabad Old city’
subtitle: The incident in the video took place in Indore, not in Hyderabad. Some locals of Tatpatti Bakhal of Indore had pelted stones at health workers who went there to screen people in the wake of COVID-19 outbreak.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video of health workers being attacked with stones is being shared on Facebook with the claim that the incident happened in the Old city of Hyderabad when doctors tried to test people for COVID-19. But, ‘FACTLY’ has found that the incident took place in Indore (Madhya Pradesh). On 01 April 2020, some locals of Tatpatti Bakhal of Indore had pelted stones at health workers who went there to screen people in the wake of COVID-19 outbreak.

Did you watch our new video?
